extendedInfo.description: All 6 Playstation Vita AR Cards on your phone wherever you go! This app contains no copyright infringements and all images have been created by myself, so enjoy!Recently updated so the cards actually work and now includes a new feature called "MultiView" where all 6 cards are on screen at once (see screens above). You can drag them around and pressing the menu key will let you disable them individually and resize them all. Works great on a tablet!Also check out my other apps including a game by my other studio, "Critter Rollers", search for it on the market. Free download!Enjoy playing with your PS Vita :P

reviews.title: Genius......
reviews.comment: When I got my Vita, and tried out the AR games, I thought \"wow great games, but im not carrying a pack of cards everywhere\". This app is....Genius

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: For such a simple (but clever) program, it\'s tempting to just make an ad-free version myself.

reviews.title: Great and cool
reviews.comment: It is so cool but it has a bit of troubles with table soccer but alltogether it is an incredible app.

reviews.title: Unstable on Xperia Z
reviews.comment: All cards register perfectly on my Vita, however the app force closes when multi view is selected. Will give more stars when this fixed.

reviews.title: Good job!
reviews.comment: I have a HTC One s the only problem is no multi view otherwise great job they work and look great!

reviews.comment: Amazing app but i.wish there was another feature. Please read this comment and tell me if you agree\tI love this app and i give it a 5 out of 5 but i wish you could turn the cards in a angle so like table football in that game you can where the stand and the score board goes and which angle it can put it. If you don\'t mind Andrew Wilson can you do this for all of us thanks.  Amazing app though
